dataSource: WebSearch aggregation (Trendlyne, MoneyControl, Screener, StockAnalysis, KotakSecurities, MarketsMojo)

Q2_FY2026.notes: Highest-ever quarterly revenue. Net profit surged 141.23% QoQ and 21.51% YoY from Rs 52.87 cr. Revenue jumped 36.83% sequentially. Festive season demand driven.

Q3_FY2026.notes: Revenue grew 10.2% YoY. Net profit fell 43.7% YoY. EBITDA declined 9.4% YoY. Mixed performance with revenue growth but profitability decline.

keyRatios.notes: Debt-free. Net cash position of Rs 865.90 million (cash Rs 2.66 bn, debt Rs 1.80 bn).

balanceSheetHighlights.notes: Very conservative capital structure with virtually no net debt. Analysts have recently downgraded to Sell on valuation and growth concerns.

keyHighlights: Q2 FY26 strong festive quarter but masks underlying margin pressures
Highest-ever quarterly revenue of Rs 833.70 cr in Q2 FY26
Persistent margin concerns despite revenue growth
HDFC Securities company update published Sep 2025
